body_html:
what is the command that you used to install?

There's absolutely no question of the cuda 9.2 binary being dependent on libcurand.so, as we statically link to curand. I double-checked the binaries just now to see that they declare no such dependencies. Are you loading any other library that needs CUDA?
body_text:
what is the command that you used to install?
There's absolutely no question of the cuda 9.2 binary being dependent on libcurand.so, as we statically link to curand. I double-checked the binaries just now to see that they declare no such dependencies. Are you loading any other library that needs CUDA?
body:
what is the command that you used to install?

There's absolutely no question of the cuda 9.2 binary being dependent on `libcurand.so`, as we statically link to curand. I double-checked the binaries just now to see that they declare no such dependencies. Are you loading any other library that needs CUDA?
